articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK-China Joint Guidance Committee Monday left here for Beijing, China to take part in the third meeting of the committee.
					 It was headed by its DPRK side Chairman Jang Song Thaek who is a department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 The meeting is reportedly to discuss the joint development and joint management of Rason Economic Trade Zone and Hwanggumphyong and Wihwado Economic Zone.

articles.title: Moves of Japan Engrossed in Grabbing Tok Islets Ridiculed
articles.content:
Moves of Japan Engrossed in Grabbing Tok Islets Ridiculed 
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The chief executive of south Korea toured Tok Islets on August 10.
					 As soon as his plan to visit the islets was announced, different circles of south Korea were critical of it, saying that the visit was intended to cover up his true colors as a pro-Japanese lackey, calm down the angry public and weather his ruling crisis.
					
					 The Japanese government authorities made much fuss about the south Korean chief executive's visit to the islets.
					
					 The Japanese prime minister, the foreign minister and others made public appearance one after another to say that "it was regretful" and "they would strongly react to it". 
					
					 They even made a protest to the south Korean minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade. They recalled the Japanese ambassador to south Korea and threatened to bring the issue of Tok Islets to the International Court of Justice.
					
					 Japan declared a freeze of shuttle diplomacy with south Korea, postponed the annual meeting of financial ministers and started to examine the cancellation of its prime minister's visit to south Korea.
					
					 The president of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan said "the visit was a denial of the past efforts to improve the Japan-south Korea relations" and "south Korea diplomatically showed it has no ability to administer its state affairs.
					
					 Timed to coincide with the Japanese authorities' ruckus, a hooligan threw a piece of brick at the south Korean consulate general in Hiroshima, Japan and ran away, creating furor.
					
					 This was Japan's impudent act reminiscent of a thief crying "Stop the thief!" 
					
					 The south Korean "government", however, postponed the drill for defending Tok Islets slated for mid-August. 
					
					 It is the unanimous comment in south Korea and abroad that the Japanese reactionaries' impudent territorial claim to inalienable part of the territory of Korea is attributable to the south Korean "government" authorities' low-profile diplomacy and sycophancy towards Japan.

articles.title: White Paper of DFRK Central Committee Slams S. Korea-Japan Military Nexus
articles.content:
White Paper of DFRK Central Committee Slams S. Korea-Japan Military Nexus 
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK) released a white paper on Monday dealing with the present situation and danger of the south Korea-Japan military nexus and the south Korean puppet regime's sycophancy towards Japan.
					 According to the white paper, no sooner had traitor Lee Myung Bak took office than he drastically expanded the scope of military exchange and cooperation with the Japanese reactionaries.
					
					  It said:
					
					 He set up the "working council for defense exchange and cooperation", a permanent working military consultative organization, in January 2008 and concluded a "protocol on defense exchange" and decided to boost military exchange in all aspects at the talks between the defense ministers in April 2009.
					
					 He rolled up his sleeves to fake up the south Korea-Japan "joint declaration on security" which means a military alliance, in particular.
					
					 In January 2011 when the Japanese defense minister visited south Korea, he promised to conclude the General Security of Military Information Agreement the keynote of which is to establish military strategies and exchange information about nukes and missiles in "contingency in the north".
					
					 After coming to power, Lee opted for intensifying joint military drills with the Japan "Self-Defense Forces", claiming that south Korea could not cope with military muscle of the nuclear capable north and China only through joint sea search and rescue trainings with Japan. 
					
					 In his New Year diplomatic speech and his policy speech at the ceremony for opening the plenary session of the Diet in January last year former Japanese Prime Minister Naoto Kan set it as Japan's main orientation of diplomatic policy to build "future-oriented relations" by further strengthening bilateral cooperative relations including cooperation in the security field with south Korea.
					
					 Considering Lee Myung Bak's seizure of power and his action taken to boost the military nexus with Japan as the golden opportunity, the Japanese reactionaries buckled down in real earnest to rewriting or revising the laws obstructive to the moves to militarize Japan including the "Pacifist Constitution" which they could not push forward. For instance, they fabricated a "new bill for revising the Law on SDF" and the "bill for revising the law on the situation in the surrounding areas" which call for expanding the radius of SDF's operation which was confined to Japan's territorial waters to the whole Asia-Pacific region. In late December last year they convened a security meeting at which they drastically eased the "three principles of arms export," making it possible to jointly develop latest weapons with other countries and export weapons to them.
					
					 In June this year they provided a legal foundation for going nuclear by inserting words "security guarantee" in the "basic law on atomic energy." They paved the way for pushing forward space militarization by deleting the provision that space research should be conducted for peaceful purposes from the "basic law on space". They are now stepping up the laying of the legal foundation for turning Japan into a "state capable of waging a war".
					
					  They are speeding up the restructuring of the SDF and its arms buildup in the direction of letting it carry out the duty for overseas aggression.
					
					 The intensified military nexus between the south Korean puppet regime and the Japanese reactionaries is leading to the formation of the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance.
					
					 Openly uttering "he would not urge Japan to apologize for its past crimes", Lee has held more than 20 rounds of talks with the Japanese reactionaries so far. But he has never put on the table such sensitive political and military issues as the issue of liquidating Japan's past history and the issue of militarist revival. 
					
					 On the contrary, Lee vociferated about "the diplomacy through exchange of heads of state between south Korea and Japan" and visits of lawmakers and politicians of the two sides, bringing into bolder relief his pro-Japanese stance in all fields including politics, economy, military affairs and culture.
					
					 When Japanese Prime Minister Fukuda at a meeting with Lee in July 2008 proposed to include the description of Tok Islets as part of the territory of Japan in "new guidelines for teaching" social subjects for senior middle schoolers of Japan, Lee asked Fukuda to "wait for some time."
					
					 When the Japanese reactionaries formally issued a "diplomatic blue book" in April 2010, claiming that "Tok Islets are part of the territory of Japan," Lee shut his eyes to this issue, calling for "quiet diplomacy." 
					
					 He zealously opted for tightening the tie-up with the Japanese reactionaries against the DPRK. He requested Japan to support his position urging the north to dismantle "its nukes" first and his policy of "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars" on several occasions including a meeting held in Japan in April 2008. He pledged to make positive cooperation with the Japanese reactionaries to see the realization of their stand that the DPRK-Japan relations can be normalized only after the DPRK's comprehensive settlement of "nuclear and missile issues and the issue of Japanese abductees." He connived, shielded and backed Japan's moves to stage a comeback to Korea in return for its cooperation and support over the "issue of north's nukes" and the "sanctions against it."
					
					 At talks held with China and Japan in May 2010 he implored them for "cooperation in slapping sanctions against the north", crying over the "Cheonan" warship incident.
					
					 When Japanese Prime Minister Noda paid a visit to south Korea in October 2011, Lee begged him for cooperation over the "issue of north's nukes." In return for it he shut his eyes to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and its moves to grab part of the territory of Korea and agreed to start the second south Korea-Japan "joint research in the new era" to establish "future-oriented relations". 
					
					 It is only the clan of the "Saenuri Party" that shields, patronizes and praises Lee's pro-Japanese acts. 
					
					 They are the same despicable pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese lackeys as Lee and accomplices in political and military nexus with the Japanese reactionaries. 
					
					 The military nexus now being tightened between the south Korean puppet forces and the Japanese reactionaries according to the U.S. strategic need is now posing the danger of a new war to the Korean Peninsula and gravely threatening the peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The Korean nation can never allow the Korean Peninsula to turn into a theatre of competition among outsiders again and the Koreans to become their miserable victims due to the crimes of Lee Myung Bak and the clan of the "Saenuri Party", concluded the white paper.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Foodstuff and Medicines to Orphanages and Almshouses
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Foodstuff and Medicines to Orphanages and Almshouses
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent dozens of tons of quality foodstuffs of various sorts as well as hundreds of thousands of items of medicines to the nursery schools, orphanages and asylums for the aged in North Hwanghae Province.
					 Kim Jong Un had sent new clothes, black chickens and foodstuffs to the orphans on the Day of the Sun and June 1 International Children's Day this year.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian Political Party
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian Political Party
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil.
					 Rosanita Monteiro de Campos, vice-president of the party, handed it to Ri Hwa Gun, DPRK ambassador to Brazil, on Aug. 7.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. for Slandering DPRK's Songun Politics
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. for Slandering DPRK's Songun Politics 
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is now intent on curbing the DPRK from enforcing the Songun politics. 
					 It blamed the flood damage in the DPRK on its Songun politics. 
					
					 It let "professors" and defectors to the south say in VOA appearances that "many aspects show failure in the government's policy" and "the north should change the Songun politics to control flood".
					
					 The U.S. made ridiculous sophism, linking the abnormal climatic conditions and natural disasters that sweep the world with the Songun politics. This is a typical example offering a glimpse to its hostility toward the dignified Songun politics and socialist system in the DPRK and another grave and unpardonable politically-motivated provocation. 
					
					 As recognized by the international community, the truth and vitality of the cause of independence, cause of Songun in the DPRK have already been proved by history as they promote progress of society and mankind to meet the desire of the popular masses for independence. 
					
					 The gigantic nature-harnessing projects may face temporary ordeals and unexpected natural disaster. The DPRK overcomes the ordeals and disasters by dint of the great unity of army and people under the banner of Songun. 
					
					 Songun politics of the DPRK represents the ever-victorious treasured sword for protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country and welfare of the people. 
					
					 The DPRK owes a lot to the Songun politics in the present drive for building an economic power for realizing people's wishes. 
					
					 It remains unchanged in its stand on the Songun politics. 
					
					 The U.S., however, is kicking up mean propaganda with its face turned away from the situation of the DPRK, which is heading for the world. 
					
					 The aim is to undercut the prestige of the DPRK dignified with Songun and build up discontent in its society and bring down Korean-style socialist system at any cost. 
					
					 Forcing the DPRK to change the Songun politics is little short of forcing it to lay down arms and surrender to the U.S. It is just another version of the theory of "regime change".
					
					 This only reveals the absurdity of the U.S. assertion that it has no hostility toward the DPRK. 
					
					 If there should be any policy switchover, they are the U.S. foreign and domestic policies. 
					
					 Hurricane "Katrina" that hit America in 2005 brought to light the political and moral vulnerabilities of the U.S. At that time the VOA admitted it, saying that the natural disaster highlighted the need to tackle the poverty and racism as a policy issue inside the U.S. This report is still fresh in the memory of the world people.
					
					 At present the U.S. brigandish policy disregarding the sovereignty of other countries and right to existence of their people is the main cause of violation of innocent people and their deaths. 
					
					 As proven by the fact, the U.S. policy is the most reactionary and unethical one that imposes all sorts of disasters upon mankind. 
					
					 The U.S. should feel ashamed of its own sordid policy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Combating Imperialists' Ideological and Cultural Poisoning
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Combating Imperialists' Ideological and Cultural Poisoning 
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary countries and people of the world should wage a vigorous struggle to check the bourgeois ideological and cultural poisoning, deeply aware of its reactionary nature, harmfulness and danger, urges Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article. 
					 Bourgeois idea and culture are very dangerous ideological viruses as they make people mentally deranged, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Bourgeois idea and culture gradually penetrate into people's minds to strike their roots and spoil society and make it degenerated. 
					
					 Those countries which were building socialism collapsed overnight because they allowed bourgeois life style, American way of life to prevail in society.
					
					 Bourgeois ideology and culture are harmful because they benumb people's consciousness of independence and thus reduce them to human scum who think neither of making a revolution nor of doing any work. Their ultimate goal is to obliterate national culture of other countries and thus deprive the people of their national identity.
					
					 People's revolutionary spirit is bound to be benumbed, once they are infected with bourgeois ideology and culture. If people are entangled in the enemy's moves for bourgeois ideological and cultural poisoning, they will be utterly indifferent to their country.
					
					 The revolutionary and progressive countries should intensify the combat against the bourgeois ideological and cultural poisoning.
					
					 It is necessary to firmly prepare the people politically and ideologically, develop national culture and pay special attention to the education of the young people.
					
					 It is imperative to maintain a high vigilance against even the slightest manifestation of the bourgeois ideological and cultural poisoning and thoroughly combat it.
					
					 A single step for concession in combating bourgeois ideology and culture is bound to lead to ten, nay a hundred steps for concessions.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Lee's Regime of Escalating Confrontation of Social Systems
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Regime of Escalating Confrontation of Social Systems 
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative group is floating a story about what it called "changes," making a wrong picture of the DPRK from its view on value and way of thinking.
					 It is letting loose a spate of jargons about "reforms" and "multi-faceted exchange and cooperation" as it pleases. It went the lengths of deliberately talking about even the dignified Songun politics of the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: These are nothing but ridiculous remarks made by the political imbeciles who know nothing about the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has so far developed through steady changes, while building a socialist society centered on the popular masses, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is south Korea where stunning changes are expected as it is under the reign of foreign forces and traitors.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should be aware of their imminent miserable fate before talking about someone's "changes."
					
					 The fiction about "a sort of change in the north" spread by the south Korean conservative group only brings to light its wild ambition for the confrontation between social systems.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak and his group have never told truth about the DPRK. They have malignantly slandered the DPRK, twisting and distorting everything and vociferating about "its human rights performance".
					
					 The nonsense talked by them about "changes in the north" goes to prove what ridiculous daydreams they have.
					
					 Duties, strategies and methods of struggle may change in the progress of the revolution. But there can be no change in the DPRK's strategic line. The south Korean authorities would be well advised to awake from their daydream.
					
					 Unshakable is the revolutionary stand of the DPRK to accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation, taking Kim Jong Il's patriotism as a treasured sword.

articles.title: Torch Relay Runners of Young Vanguard Set Off from Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Torch Relay Runners of Young Vanguard Set Off from Mt. Paektu
 Samjiyon, August 13 (KCNA) -- Torch relay race of young vanguard began in the DPRK to mark the occasion of the Youth Day.
					 The runners are to arrive in Pyongyang through east and west coastal areas.
					
					 A meeting was held on the top of Mt. Paektu Monday to kick off the race.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report there.
					
					 Reflected in the torch relay race is the noble intention and great expectation of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un that the five million young vanguard would continue to display the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and carry forward the tradition of single-minded unity and heroic struggle, following the great Workers' Party of Korea by inheriting the brilliant history and tradition of the Korean youth movement, the reporter said.
					
					 The Korean youth movement has greeted a new heyday of its development as it is holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme leader of the party, state and army, he stressed.
					
					 The movement is more dynamically advancing thanks to Kim Jong Un's politics of attaching importance to the youth and loving them, he added.
					
					 As the torch relay race was declared, the ranks set off, divided into east and west coastal areas, holding high the torches with the flags bearing the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the van.

articles.title: Torchlight Relay of Soldiers Starts
articles.content:
Torchlight Relay of Soldiers Starts
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK significantly greets August 28 as Youth Day every year.
					 To mark the day this year service personnel started torchlight relay with due ceremony on Mt. Osong on Monday. The mountain is associated with Songun leadership of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The relay group is divided into two: one in the east coastal Sea area and the other in the west coastal area. Their destination is Pyongyang.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were General Pak Jae Gyong and other generals, officers and exemplary soldiers of ground, naval, air and air defence forces.
					
					 All the participants made solemn salutes looking up to the flags portraying smiling Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, shouting "Hurrah!"
					
					 A report was made at the ceremony which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the whole course of the relay is associated with patriotic devotion made by the Generalissimos to the country and people, referring to the pride of holding the ceremony on Mt. Osong ahead of Youth Day.
					
					 They noted the relay would demonstrate to the whole world the revolutionary spirit of service personnel for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 As the start command was made, the ranks of the relay runners started for the destination, following the torchbearers.
					
					 All the participants were full of firm will to advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism indicated by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: 49th National Sports Contest among Juvenile Sports Schools Held
articles.content:
49th National Sports Contest among Juvenile Sports Schools Held 
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The 49th national sports contest among juvenile sports schools took place in Pyongyang, Chongjin, Wonsan, Samjiyon and other parts of the country. 
					 The contestants were divided into two groups -- school youth group and juvenile group. Its participants competed in more than 30 events including football, basketball, volleyball, table-tennis, track-and-field, weight-lifting and gymnastics. 
					
					 The results of school youth groups are as follows: Boys of the sports school of Phohang District in Chongjin and girls of the sports school of Moranbong District in Pyongyang came first in handball event while players of the sports school of Central District of Pyongyang took the title in gymnastics event. Boys of the sports school of the Swimming Gymnasium in Chongchun Street and girls of Pyongyang marine sports school came first in the swimming events.
					
					 The results of juvenile groups are as follows: Boys and girls of Pyongyang placed first in football. Boys of the sports school of Phohang District in Chongjin and girls of the sports school of Moranbong District in Pyongyang came first in handball. Boys from Pyongyang and girls from North Phyongan Province came first in the track-and-field events. 
					
					 A closing ceremony of the contest was held in Nampho on Monday.

articles.title: Selected Works of Kim Jong Il (Enlarged Edition) Vol. 16 Published in DPRK
articles.content:
Selected Works of Kim Jong Il (Enlarged Edition) Vol. 16 Published in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Vol. 16 of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (enlarged edition) was brought out in the DPRK.
					 The book contains 12 works including talks and letters published by general secretary Kim Jong Il from December 1991 to April 1992.
					
					 In the work "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party" he clarified the basic cause of the collapse of socialism in the former Soviet Union and other countries which were building socialism and its historical lesson and the issue of strengthening the driving force of revolution with the correct guiding idea.
					
					 Works "Let Us Further Glorify Our Socialism by Strengthening the Party Work" and "Let Us Further Strengthen Single-minded Unity and Give Full Play to the Korean Nation-first Spirit" clarify the tasks and ways for defending and advancing the socialist cause with the might of unity.
					
					 Expounded in the work "Let Us Brilliantly Carry Forward and Develop the Revolutionary Traditions of Juche" are the ideas and theories on defending and glorifying the revolutionary tradition of the Workers' Party of Korea generation after generation.
					
					 Enshrined in the works "Let Us Give Fuller Play to the Political and Ideological Advantages of the Revolutionary Army" and "On Strengthening the People's Army and Establishing the Social Trait of Giving Priority to Military Affairs" are his original military ideas and theories on army building.
					
					 The book also includes the works "On Juche Literature" and "The Feature Film 'The Nation and Destiny' Should Become Great Masterpiece of Our Era" which serve as the guidelines in building Juche-based literature and arts and the work "On Developing the Light Industry and Improving the Research into Economic Management" which sets forth the tasks for remarkably improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 The book deals with the ideas, theories and policies that were raised in the revolution and construction including the issue of firmly establishing Juche in the work of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, the issue of more dynamically pushing forward the movement for national reunification and the issue of fully displaying the beautiful traits of revolutionary comradeship.

articles.title: Larix Leptolepis Forest Built in Tokchon City, DPRK
articles.content:
Larix Leptolepis Forest Built in Tokchon City, DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- In Tokchon City, South Phyongan Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, there are thousands of hectares of Larix leptolepis wood.
					 The credit for this thick wood goes to the patriotic, devoted efforts of all the citizens, Kim Yong Hwan, vice-chairman of the Tokchon City People's Committee, told KCNA.
					
					 The citizens have cultivated millions of Larix leptolepis saplings every year, while concentrating efforts on the campaign to plant and tend them.
					
					 They are now enjoying big benefits from the trees, which are enough to meet the city's demands for props at coal mines and timbers at construction projects.
					
					 Many wild animals gather in the forest.
					
					 The vice-chairman said that he would work harder to enrich and spruce up the city in hearty response to the call made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un in his recent work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country".

articles.title: Majon Recreation Ground, Bathing Resort in DPRK
articles.content:
Majon Recreation Ground, Bathing Resort in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The Majon Recreation Ground on the outskirts of Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, is now crowded with local and foreign summer visitors every day.
					 The recreation ground, covering some 400 hectares, is famous for bathing resort. It boasts of fantastic rocks and high and low hills including Mt. Taebawi in its northwest part.
					
					 There are also various plants including pine-tree, sweet brier and rose along the seashore.
					
					 In particular, its sand beach, 50-100 meters in width and 6 000 meters in length and crystalline seawater add to the beauty of the recreation ground. The water depth of the resort is about 1.5 meters.
					
					 The recreation ground includes a public bathing resort, Soho children's bathing area, schoolchildren's camp, flower garden, rest home and Majon Hotel.
					
					 Majon Hotel, modernly built a few years ago, consists of three buildings and has shower stalls and beach volleyball court along the seashore. The hotel also houses dancing hall, shop, bowling alley, indoor wading pool and other welfare service facilities.
					
					 Nowadays the number of foreign tourists is ever increasing in the Majon Recreation Ground splendidly built under the popular policy of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Japan's Past Sex Slavery Arouses Criticism Worldwide
articles.content:
Japan's Past Sex Slavery Arouses Criticism Worldwide
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Criticism at Japan's past sexual slavery is growing stronger at home and abroad with the approach of Aug. 15 when the Japanese imperialists were defeated in the Second World War.
					 In this regard Ri Yong Hwan, candidate academician at the History Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, told KCNA:
					
					 "The sexual slavery, the worst anti-ethical crime in the 20th century, was committed in an organized way under the intervention and directive of the then government and military of Japan.
					
					 As the Japanese military systematized the sexual slavery, comfort centers were installed in all areas occupied by the Japanese aggressor troops.
					
					 According to the minutes (dated Sept. 3, 1942) of a Japanese Ministry of War meeting, the comfort centers totaled to 400, including 100 in northern China, 100 in Southeast Asia and 10 in the southern part of Sakhalin.
					
					 Issued on March 4, 1938 was the ministry's order No. 74 'On recruitment of employees for the army comfort stations', which was drawn up by its Justice Department and approved by the chief of the Army General Staff and the director of Justice.
					
					 Just before the provocation of the Pacific War, the ministry gave the expeditionary army units such an order as 'On recruitment of comfort women for the army'.
					
					 Furthermore, the Japanese imperialists gave shape to the way of providing sexual slaves and instituted a law to handle this affair on an organized basis.
					
					 The Japanese government made public the policy on enforcement of the system of women's voluntary labor corps (comfort women), ratified by the prime minister, in September 1943 and a decree on women's voluntary labor in August 1944.
					
					 Such confidential documents and minutes were found out and revealed one after another at various institutions of Japan to irrefutably prove its past crime related to the sexual slavery.
					
					 Recently, the secretary of the U.S. Department of State said that the expression of 'comfortable women for Japanese army' is wrong and it should be called 'forcible sexual slavery for Japanese army'.
					
					 In south Korea, people of different walks of life, including survivors of the sexual slavery and school youth and children, are waging a vigorous struggle in denunciation of Japan's past crimes and scheme for reinvasion.
					
					 In Japan, too, people strongly urge the settlement of its disgraceful past.
					
					 Japan should not deceive the world people but honestly apologize and make reparation for all its past crimes to the Koreans and other Asian people, following the precedent of Germany."

articles.title: Arch of Triumph Visited by Endless Stream of People
articles.content:
Arch of Triumph Visited by Endless Stream of People 
						
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Three decades have passed since a ceremony took place to unveil the Arch of Triumph to convey down through generations the personality of President Kim Il Sung as a great man who returned in triumph to Korea after liberating it.
					 Nearly 40,000 organizations and delegations and a total of more than 1.48 million people have visited it over the last three decades since its erection.
					
					 More than 80,000 people visited the Arch of Triumph in 1982 alone, the year of its erection.
					
					 The visitors said in excited tones that they seemed to hear the cheers from all the Koreans praising Kim Il Sung who returned in triumph after liberating Korea through the bloody war against the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Conspicuous in the majestic arch are numbers of "1925" and "1945".
					
					 Before the group sculptures there, visitors keenly realized it was thanks to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, a peerlessly great man, that the DPRK turned into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Watching the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of revolution, that stand out in bold relief, they looked back on the leadership exploits of leader Kim Jong Il who made sure that the song praising the sun was selected as its main theme and led the erection of the monument with meticulous care.
					
					 More than 380,000 foreigners, overseas Koreans and south Koreans visited it. 
					
					 Heads of parties, states and governments and prominent figures from different countries of the world and overseas Koreans were unsparing in their praises of the President, expressing their admiration at the magnificent Arch of Triumph.
					
					 It will tower high forever, conveying the immortal exploits performed by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung for liberating Korea to posterity.

articles.title: Blazing Temperature Registered in Korea
articles.content:
Blazing Temperature Registered in Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Blazing temperature has been registered in most areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea from the beginning of August in the wake of July flood.
					 31-36 degrees Celsius was observed in daytime in Pyongyang, Phyongsong, Sariwon and Haeju cities from August 1 to 11, 3-6 degrees higher than the average year.
					
					 The highest daytime temperature in Sinuiju, Kanggye, Hyesan cities in the same period was 32-34 degrees Celsius, 3-4 degrees higher than the average year, and that in the east coastal areas from August 6 to 11 was 27-32 degrees Celsius, 2-4 degrees higher than average.
					
					 The average temperature in the first ten days of August was 28.2 degrees Celsius in Pyongyang, 28.9 in Haeju, 28.1 in Sariwon and 28.5 in Kaesong, an all-time record high. Such high temperature was registered in other areas, too.
					
					 This hot weather is due to the massive inflow of hot and humid air from subtropical zone, affected by the northwest Pacific high pressure after seasonal rainy front that moved north of 43 degrees north latitude.
					
					 Temperature in the mornings and evenings has gone down a bit from August 12 but the daytime temperature is expected to remain fairly high, according to weather experts.

articles.title: Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Arch of Triumph
articles.content:
Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Arch of Triumph
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), and its members visited the Arch of Triumph here on Monday on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They looked round it, being briefed on the fact that it was successfully built to convey down through generations the exploits performed by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, a peerlessly patriot and legendary hero, by liberating Korea.
					
					 He said after the tour:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung liberated Korea through the hard-fought anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					 He was benefactor for the revival of the nation.
					
					 The immortal exploits performed by him will shine forever along with the nation's history.
					
					 The country's reunification, desire of the President, will surely be achieved as the DPRK is guided by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Truth about US, S. Korean Abduction and Terrorism Disclosed (4)
articles.content:
Truth about US, S. Korean Abduction and Terrorism Disclosed (4)
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean regime is conspiring with the U.S. in driving the defectors to south Korea and wicked renegades into hatching plots against the DPRK and subversive and sabotage activities against it.
					 There are at least 300 organizations engaged in such activities organized with those defectors to south Korea. They include the "Committee for Democratizing the North", "Federation of Movement for Freedom in the North", "General Association of Organizations of Defectors", "NK Intellectuals Solidarity", "Association of Defectors for Preparations for Unification", "Headquarters of Movement for Democratizing the North", "Front for Liberation of People in the North", "Alliance of Free Soldiers in the North" and "Alliance of Defectors' Societies in South Korea."
					
					  The puppet regime selects wicked renegades and takes them to the U.S. so that they may get special education and training. They gather confidential information about the DPRK through the above-said organizations.
					
					 The south Korean "Ministry of Unification" and the Intelligence Service select guys capable of gathering information and infiltrate them into the DPRK side after providing them with mobile phones and digital cameras.
					
					 They are desperately driving them into information gathering operations, with promises that if any informant succeeds in bringing a video lasting 10 seconds on the life of inhabitants of the DPRK markets, he may be paid up to 100 U.S. dollars, if anyone who brings confidential information, he may receive 280-470 dollars and whoever gathers information about the leadership of the DPRK may get up to 1 400 dollars.
					
					 According to south Korean media, more than a hundred organizations called "Brokers of Information about the North" are active in areas near the northern border of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime are hurling anti-DPRK plot-breeding organizations into the operations to disturb the mindset of the people in the DPRK.
					
					 The "Federation of the Movement for Freedom in the North" and other organizations of defectors to south Korea are busy scattering  leaflets and airing broadcasting  programs hurting  the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and distorting and slandering the socialist system in the DPRK and its policies.
					
					 Tens of millions of leaflets have been scattered hundreds of times through those defectors and renegades.
					
					 Since 2010, they have sent balloons containing specially manufactured "DVD leaflets" and "USB leaflets" into the DPRK side claiming that a leaflet can contain just a page of a newspaper but a DVD may carry a lot of anti-DPRK propaganda stories.
					
					 In 2011 alone, the anti-DPRK plot-breeding organizations sent balloons carrying 1.7 million leaflets, over 1 550 DVDs, more than 7 000 pieces of one U.S. dollar note and pamphlets and poor quality foodstuffs and daily necessities, etc. under the patronage of the puppet regime.
					
					 The then U.S. President Bush invited to the White House in September 2008 Pak Sang Hak, representative of the "Federation of the Movement for Freedom in the North" who took the lead in the leaflet scattering operations. Bush told him not to lose courage, praising him for doing a tough job for the freedom of the north.
					
					 The regime is spreading anti-DPRK rumors based on lies and fabrications through defectors to south Korea, asserting it quoted "sources from Hamgyong Provinces" and "sources from Ryanggang Province."

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Liberator of Korea
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Liberator of Korea
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the day of Korea's liberation (Aug. 15) from Japan's colonial rule, the Korean people are looking back upon the great feats performed by President Kim Il Sung for the national rebirth.
					 In his early years Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of the revolutionary struggle with a firm pledge to gain the independence of the country, and founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army in April Juche 21 (1932).
					
					 He fathered the Juche idea and set forth correct revolutionary lines to pave the road for national liberation, guiding the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory with his gifted military intelligence and distinguished leadership.
					
					 During those days he led many battles with the one million-strong Kwantung army of the Japanese imperialists to victory by introducing such superb guerrilla tactics as decoy and ambush tactic and telescope tactic.
					
					 Among them were the battle for defending the Xiaowangqing guerrilla zone, Luozigou battle, Laoheishan battle, Pochonbo battle and Jiansanfeng battle.
					
					 After all, the KPRA commanded by him defeated the Japanese imperialist army, prevailing over its numerical and technical superiority with ideological and tactical one.
					
					 The victory of the anti-Japanese armed struggle was entirely ascribable to the outstanding command of the President.
					
					 Under his guidance Korea put an end to its distress-torn history and the Korean people emerged the most dignified nation in the world.

articles.title: Japan's Apology and Reparation Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Apology and Reparation Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Council with Grand Mothers of the "Volunteers Corps" declared that they would wage unflinching struggle to exact apology and reparation from the war criminal enterprise of the Japanese imperialists.
					 The organization condemned Japan's Mitsubishi Heavy Industry Co. for flatly denying the apology and reparation for forcing the Korean people into slave labor after taking them away to Japan. This resulted in July 6 break-down of the negotiations that had been under way since 2010.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The citizens' organization of Japan will reopen the Friday-action urging the liquidation of the past in front of the main building of the Mitsubishi Heavy Industry Co. and Sinagawa railway station.
					
					 It noted that they would actively try to take the Mitsubishi Heavy Industry Co. to task for the war crimes to a finish.

articles.title: KCTU Declares All-out Actions
articles.content:
KCTU Declares All-out Actions
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) declared all-out actions to have issues settled including the situation at Ssangyong Motors at a meeting in Seoul on August 11, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The participants in the meeting accused the company side of still refusing to meet the demands of the unreasonably discharged workers.
					
					 They condemned the authorities for hurling gangsters into violence against the workers struggling in their work sites to have their right to existence guaranteed.
					
					 They stated the organization would launch actions including a general strike to have the present situation settled.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Laud Feats of Kim Il Sung in Liberating Korea
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Laud Feats of Kim Il Sung in Liberating Korea 
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers devoted articles to the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The Bangladeshi paper Ekota on August 7 in an article titled "Liberator of Korea" said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung liberated the Korean nation from colonial slavery.
					
					 He founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army on April 25, 1932, enabling the Korean people's struggle to liberate their country to advance by their own armed forces.
					
					 The Korean people bravely turned out in the sacred struggle against the Japanese imperialists to accomplish the historic cause of liberating the country under his leadership, looking up to him as the sun of the nation.
					
					 The feats of the President who liberated Korea have been cherished in the minds of the Korean people and other progressive peoples.
					
					 The Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer on August 6 in an article headed "Legendary Guerrilla" noted:
					
					 The President advanced the line of liberating the country by relying on the people's own efforts and waged the hard-fought armed struggle.
					
					 He dealt telling blows to the Japanese imperialists and won victories by employing superb strategies and unique guerrilla tactics. His personality as the legendary guerrilla commander will always shine.
					
					 The Pakistani paper Baluchistan Times on August 8 also carried a similar article.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in India
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in India 
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A seminar on general secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was held by the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il on August 3.
					 Displayed in the venue of the event were photos showing feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the effort for reunifying the country.
					
					 The chairman of the society and other speakers lauded Kim Jong Il for formulating the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification.
					
					 They said that the charters serve as the fair and aboveboard proposal suited to the specific conditions of the Korean Peninsula and reflecting the unanimous desire of the Koreans for national reunification.
					
					 They expressed conviction that the Korean people will surely achieve the cause of national reunification under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Russian Figure Lauds Single-minded Unity of DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Figure Lauds Single-minded Unity of DPRK 
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Anatoli Dolgachev, chairman of the Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the Far Eastern region of Russia, was interviewed by the Russian paper Argumenti Nejelli.
					 The paper on July 26 carried the content of the press conference.
					
					 It said:
					
					 It is important for the mass media of Russia to have a correct outlook on the DPRK.
					
					 The county is not as how it was described by the western media.
					
					 The situation of the country can be grasped through celebrations of the 100th birthday of President Kim Il Sung, founder of the DPRK.
					
					 This advantageous socialist country enforces such popular policies as free medical care and free education.
					
					 Friendly feelings of the Korean people toward the Russian people are true and this is based on the friendship between the two peoples.
					
					 The country is the single-minded socialist state which no one dare provoke.
					
					 It is on account of this single-minded unity more powerful than the nukes that the U.S. has not dared provoke it.
					
					 Tears shed by the Korean people over the loss of Kim Jong Il showed their warm loyalty to their leader and the western media also admitted it.
					
					 There is a saying "Seeing is believing." If Russian media persons witness the situation of the country, this will help them properly understand it.

articles.title: British Body Condemns Projected U.S.-S. Korea Military Exercises
articles.content:
British Body Condemns Projected U.S.-S. Korea Military Exercises 
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a statement on August 5 denouncing the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and south Korean puppet warmongers for planning to wage Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills (UFG).
					 The statement said that the military drills are aimed at invading the DPRK to all intents and purposes.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that the U.S. is attempting to hurl into the projected saber-rattling service personnel of some countries including UK that dispatched their troops to the last Korean War under the helmet of "UN forces".
					
					 UFG is not only a serious challenge to the sovereignty of the DPRK and its dignity but also a threat to the world peace and security.
					
					 We demand the U.S. cancel such plan at once and withdraw its aggressor forces from south Korea.
					
					 We also call upon all the anti-imperialist peace-loving figures of the UK to come out in the actions for checking the involvement in the military maneuvers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Russian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The main content of general secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was carried by the 29th issue of the Russian paper Patriot.
					 The work, published on August 4, 1997, clarifies the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung performed for national reunification.
					
					 It formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification. It also indicates the tasks and ways for carrying out the cause of national reunification on the basis of the charters. 
					
					 The paper carried a portrait of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Peruvian Group
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Peruvian Group
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The main content of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" was posted on the Internet website by the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on August 4.
					 The work, published on July 26, 2012, clarifies the essence of 
					
					Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his career characterized by ardent love for the country and its people.
					
					 It also clarifies important issues arising in effecting Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia regalos a asilos de ninos, huerfanos y ancianos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia regalos a asilos de ninos, huerfanos y ancianos
 Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio decenas de toneladas de alimentos y muchos medicamentos a los asilos de ninos, huerfanos y ancianos de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					 Los ninos y huerfanos de alli tambien recibieron con motivo del Dia del Sol (15 de abril-cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung) y el Dia Internacional de la Infancia de Primero de Junio nuevas ropas y alimentos inclusive pollo negro, enviados por el Maximo Dirigente.

articles.title: FDRP publica carta blanca sobre la alianza militar Sur de Corea-Japon
articles.content:
FDRP publica carta blanca sobre la alianza militar Sur de Corea-Japon
 Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria hizo publica el dia 13 la carta blanca que delata la situacion actual y peligrosidad de la confabulacion militar Sur de Corea-Japon y los crimenes vendepatrias projaponeses de la banda titere surcoreana.
					 Segun el documento, tan pronto como tomo el poder, el traidor Lee Myung Bak amplio y fortalecio la esfera de intercambio y cooperacion militares con los reaccionarios islenos.
					
					 Se fundo en enero de 2008 el "Consejo de Trabajo para el Intercambio y la Cooperacion de Defensa Nacional", organizacion permanente para la consulta de asuntos militares, y en el dialogo de ministros de Defensa sostenido en abril de 2009, fue firmado oficialmente el "documento de la intencion sobre el intercambio de defensa".
					
					 Sobre todo, la banda titere surcoreana se puso activa en la invencion de la "Declaracion Conjunta sobre la Garantia de Seguridad" Sur de Corea-Japon que significa la alianza militar.
					
					 Durante la visita al Sur de Corea del ministro japones de Defensa en enero de 2011, le prometio firmar el convenio de proteccion de informaciones militares con Japon (GSOMIA en ingles), basado en el establecimiento de la estrategia militar frente a la "situacion de emergencia en el Norte (de Corea)" y en el intercambio de informaciones sobre las armas nucleares y misiles.
					
					 Ademas, dio mas acicate a los entrenamientos militares conjuntos con las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon, insistiendo en que el ejercicio conjunto de busqueda y rescate en el mar con Japon no es suficiente para hacer frente al poderio militar del Norte de Corea y China que poseen armas nucleares.
					
					 El ex premier japones Naoto Kan, en su discurso diplomatico del Ano Nuevo hecho en enero del ano pasado, y en el otro de la politica pronunciado en la ceremonia de apertura de la sesion ordinaria de la Dieta, presento como importante direccion de la politica diplomatica de Japon ampliar mas las relaciones de cooperacion con el Sur de Corea, en particular, en la rama de seguridad, para establecer las "relaciones con vistas al futuro".
					
					 Considerando como oportunidad de oro la toma del poder del traidor Lee apuesto por fortalecer la alianza militar con Japon, los reaccionarios japoneses enmendaron la "constitucion pacifista" y otros proyectos de ley que significaban escollos para la militarizacion.
					
					 Para el respecto, fabricaron los "proyectos de enmienda de la nueva ley de las fuerzas de autodefensa" y el otro "de la ley de la situacion del contorno", que amplian el teatro de operaciones de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa", limitado al mar jurisdiccional de Japon, hasta toda la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					 A finales de diciembre del ano pasado, convocaron la conferencia de seguridad, en que restaron el rigor de los "3 principios de la exportacion de armas" permitiendo asi el desarrollo conjunto de armas ultramodernas junto con los paises extranjeros y la exportacion de armas.
					
					 En junio de este ano, introdujeron la frase de "preservacion de seguridad" en la "ley principal de energia atomica" para preparar la base legal de armamento nuclear y eliminaron de la "ley principal del cosmos" el parrafo que exigia fines pacificos de la investigacion espacial.
					
					 En los ultimos dias, se promueve el establecimiento de la base legal para convertir a Japon en el "Estado que puede hacer la guerra".
					
					 Los reaccionarios japoneses dan mas acicate a la reestructuracion y al incremento de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" para que puedan cumplir la mision de agresion a ultramar.
					
					 La confabulacion entre los titeres surcoreanos y los reaccionarios japoneses se dirige a la fabricacion de la alianza militar tripartita con Estados Unidos.
					
					 Hablando abiertamente que "no diria a Japon que se disculpe por sus crimenes del pasado", el traidor Lee Myung Bak sostuvo mas de 20 veces hasta la fecha los dialogos con los reaccionarios japoneses, pero nunca se refirio a la liquidacion de la historia del pasado de Japon, el renacimiento del militarismo y otros delicados asuntos politicos y militares.
					
					 Al contrario, expuso su postura servil a Japon en todos los dominios como la politica, la economia, los asuntos militares y la cultura hablando de la "diplomacia mediante la cumbre de ida y vuelta" y el viaje reciproco de los asambleistas y politicos.
					
					 En las conversaciones con Japon en julio de 2008, cuando el entonces premier Fukuda dijo que incluiria en la "nueva guia de estudio" para los alumnos de escuelas secundarias el parrafo de que el islote Tok es territorio japones, Lee le respondio que "espere".
					
					 Cuando los reaccionarios japoneses publicaron oficialmente en abril de 2010 la "carta azul" insistiendo lo mismo sobre el Tok, se hizo el desentendido abogando por la "diplomacia silenciosa".
					
					 Tambien el traidor Lee recurrio activamente a la confabulacion anti-RPDC con los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					 En un dialogo hecho en Japon en abril de 2008 y en otras ocasiones, mendigo el apoyo de Japon a sus demandas a la RPDC, tales como la "renuncia nuclear primero" y de "la desnuclearizacion, la apertura y tres mil USD". Y se comprometio a cooperar activamente para que se ponga en practica la posicion de los reaccionarios japoneses de normalizar las relaciones con la RPDC despues de que sean resueltos globalmente el "problema nuclear", el "de misiles" y el "de secuestro" de los japoneses. Tolero en silencio, amparo y hasta fomento los pasos de Japon para la reagresion a cambio de la cooperacion y respaldo en el "problema nuclear del Norte de Corea" y el de "sancion anti-Norte de Corea".
					
					 En las conversaciones con China y Japon sostenidas en mayo de 2010, pidio la "cooperacion en la sancion anti-RPDC" cuestionando el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan".
					
					 Cuando el premier japones Noda visito al Sur de Corea en octubre de 2011, Lee le solicito la cooperacion en el "problema nuclear del Norte" y a su vez, hizo vista gorda de la actitud japonesa en cuanto al problema de indemnizacion por el caso de esclavitud sexual y de su intento de usurpar el islote Tok. Y acordo iniciar al segundo periodo de la "investigacion conjunta de nueva epoca" Sudcorea-Japon para establecer las "relaciones con vistas al futuro".
					
					 Es solo la familia del "Partido Saenuri" que esta amparando y alabando el acto traidor pro-japones del Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 Los integrantes del citado partido son traidores servil proyanqui y pro-japones iguales a Lee y complices de la confabulacion politico-militar con los reaccionarios japones.
					
					 La connivencia militar Sudcorea-Japon, que se acelera segun la demanda estrategica del imperio norteamericano, acarrea el peligro de nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y amenaza seriamente la paz y seguridad del Noreste Asiatico y el resto del mundo.
					
					 No se debe tolerar jamas que el traidor Lee y los compinches del "Partido Saenuri" conviertan la Peninsula Coreana en el campo de pugna de las potencias y hagan de la nacion coreana su victima.

articles.title: Clausurada competencia nacional de escuelas deportivas de jovenes y ninos
articles.content:
Clausurada competencia nacional de escuelas deportivas de jovenes y ninos
 Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar en esta capital, Chongjin, Wonsan, Samjiyon y otros lugares la 49a Competencia Deportiva Nacional de las Escuelas Deportivas de Jovenes y Ninos.
					 En el marco del evento, que tuvo la categoria de juniores y la de ninos, se entablaron los partidos de 30 deportes, tales como el futbol, baloncesto, voleibol, ping-pong, atletismo, levantamiento de pesa, gimnasia, etc.
					
					 En la categoria de juniores, resultaron ganadores en el balonmano, los jugadores de la Escuela Deportiva de Jovenes y Ninos del municipio de Phohang y las jugadoras de la Escuela Deportiva de Jovenes y Ninos del municipio de Moranbong; en la gimnasia artistica, las muchachas de la Escuela Deportiva de Jovenes y Ninos del municipio Jung y en la natacion, los varones de la Escuela Deportiva de Jovenes y Ninos del Centro de Natacion del reparto Chongchun y las jugadoras de la Escuela de Deportes Maritimos de Jovenes y Ninos de la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					 En la categoria de ninos, se ubicaron en el primer lugar de futbol los jugadores de ambos sexos de la ciudad de Pyongyang; en el balonmano, los ninos de la Escuela Deportiva de Jovenes y Ninos del municipio de Phohang y las de la Escuela Deportiva de Jovenes y Ninos del municipio de Moranbong; en el atletismo, los jugadores de la ciudad de Pyongyang y las de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					
					 Tuvo lugar el dia 13 en Nampho la ceremonia de clausura.

articles.title: Bosque de alerce de Changsong en ciudad de Tokchon
articles.content:
Bosque de alerce de Changsong en ciudad de Tokchon
 Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- En la ciudad de Tokchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hay el bosque de alerce de Changsong de miles de hectareas.
					 Kim Yong Hwan (52 anos de edad), vicepresidente del Comite Popular de la ciudad de Tokchon, dijo a la ACNC como sigue:
					
					 El bosque de alerce de Changsong fue creado por todos los habitantes quienes dedicaron todo suyo para formarlo con el sentimiento de patriotismo.
					
					 Ellos produjeron cada ano millones de posturas de alerce y concentraron sus fuerzas en la plantacion y el cuidado de arboles, gracias a lo cual se ha formado por doquier el bosque de alerce.
					
					 Ahora, estamos beneficiandose de ese bosque.
					
					 El rendimiento mas singular es que producimos por cuenta propia las maderas de adema necesarias en las  minas carboniferas.
					
					 Anidan muchos animales en este bosque y se soluciona satisfactoriamente las maderas para la construccion.
					
					 Leimos hace unos dias la obra del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un "Aceleremos la construccion de una patria prospera materializando el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il". 
					
					 Guardando profundamente esta idea sudare mas en el trabajo para entregar a las nuevas generaciones la mas hermosa y rica patria.
